readable.title: 3280644151_3d89cb1e0e
readable.content: A halway has a sign that says " PORT DU CASQUE OBLIGATOIRE " and some graffiti . a kid doing tricks on the wall with his bmx bike A man in a grey hooded sweatshirt rides his bicycle on a half pipe . A person rides his bike over graffiti drawn on the ground . A picture of a skateboard ramp and a french sign .
